verses.verse: Thou shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> ox <S%H7794><s%> or his sheep <S%H7716><s%> go astray <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and hide <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8694><s%> thyself from them: thou shalt in any case <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> bring them again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto thy brother <S%H251><s%>.

And if thy brother <S%H251><s%> be not nigh <S%H7138><s%> unto thee, or if thou know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him not, then thou shalt bring <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it unto <S%H8432><s%> thine own house <S%H1004><s%>, and it shall be with thee until thy brother <S%H251><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after it, and thou shalt restore it to him again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

In like manner <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his ass <S%H2543><s%>; and so shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his raiment <S%H8071><s%>; and with all lost thing <S%H9><s%> of thy brother's <S%H251><s%>, which he hath lost <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> likewise: thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not hide <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8692><s%> thyself.

Thou shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> or his ox <S%H7794><s%> fall down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, and hide <S%H5956><s%> <S%H8694><s%> thyself from them: thou shalt surely <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> help him to lift them up again <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

The woman <S%H802><s%> shall not wear that which pertaineth <S%H3627><s%> unto a man <S%H1397><s%>, neither shall a man <S%H1397><s%> put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on a woman's <S%H802><s%> garment <S%H8071><s%>: for all that do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> so <S%H428><s%> are abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

If a bird's <S%H6833><s%> nest <S%H7064><s%> chance <S%H7122><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to be before <S%H6440><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%> in any tree <S%H6086><s%>, or on the ground <S%H776><s%>, whether they be young ones <S%H667><s%>, or eggs <S%H1000><s%>, and the dam <S%H517><s%> sitting <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the young <S%H667><s%>, or upon the eggs <S%H1000><s%>, thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the dam <S%H517><s%> with the young <S%H1121><s%>:

But thou shalt in any wise <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> let the dam <S%H517><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the young <S%H1121><s%> to thee; that it may be well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee, and that thou mayest prolong <S%H748><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy days <S%H3117><s%>.

When thou buildest <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, then thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a battlement <S%H4624><s%> for thy roof <S%H1406><s%>, that thou bring <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not blood <S%H1818><s%> upon thine house <S%H1004><s%>, if any man <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thence.

Thou shalt not sow <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy vineyard <S%H3754><s%> with divers seeds <S%H3610><s%>: lest the fruit <S%H4395><s%> of thy seed <S%H2233><s%> which thou hast sown <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of thy vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, be defiled <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thou shalt not plow <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with an ox <S%H7794><s%> and an ass <S%H2543><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.
Thou shalt not wear <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a garment of divers sorts <S%H8162><s%>, as of woollen <S%H6785><s%> and linen <S%H6593><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

Thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee fringes <S%H1434><s%> upon the four <S%H702><s%> quarters <S%H3671><s%> of thy vesture <S%H3682><s%>, wherewith thou coverest <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thyself.
If any man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto her, and hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her,

And give <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> occasions <S%H5949><s%> of speech <S%H1697><s%> against her, and bring up <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> upon her, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this woman <S%H802><s%>, and when I came <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to her, I found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her not a maid <S%H1331><s%>:

Then shall the father <S%H1><s%> of the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, and her mother <S%H517><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the tokens of the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> virginity <S%H1331><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>:

And the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%>, I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> unto this man <S%H376><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>, and he hateth <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her;

And, lo, he hath given <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> occasions <S%H5949><s%> of speech <S%H1697><s%> against her, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not thy daughter <S%H1323><s%> a maid <S%H1331><s%>; and yet these are the tokens of my daughter's <S%H1323><s%> virginity <S%H1331><s%>. And they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the cloth <S%H8071><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.
And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that man <S%H376><s%> and chastise <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him;

And they shall amerce <S%H6064><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him in an hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them unto the father <S%H1><s%> of the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, because he hath brought up <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> upon a virgin <S%H1330><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and she shall be his wife <S%H802><s%>; he may <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not put her away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all his days <S%H3117><s%>.
But if this thing <S%H1697><s%> be true <S%H571><s%>, and the tokens of virginity <S%H1331><s%> be not found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> for the damsel <S%H5291><s%>:

Then they shall bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the damsel <S%H5291><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and the men <S%H582><s%> of her city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H5619><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her with stones <S%H68><s%> that she die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: because she hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> folly <S%H5039><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, to play the whore <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: so shalt thou put <S%H1197><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

If a man <S%H376><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> lying <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with a woman <S%H802><s%> married <S%H1166><s%> <S%H8803><s%> to an husband <S%H1167><s%>, then they shall both of them <S%H8147><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, both the man <S%H376><s%> that lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with the woman <S%H802><s%>, and the woman <S%H802><s%>: so shalt thou put away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

If a damsel <S%H5291><s%> that is a virgin <S%H1330><s%> be betrothed <S%H781><s%> <S%H8794><s%> unto an husband <S%H376><s%>, and a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her in the city <S%H5892><s%>, and lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her;

Then ye shall bring <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them both <S%H8147><s%> out unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%>, and ye shall stone <S%H5619><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%> that they die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, because <S%H834><s%> <S%H1697><s%> she cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, being in the city <S%H5892><s%>; and the man <S%H376><s%>, because <S%H834><s%> <S%H1697><s%> he hath humbled <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>: so thou shalt put away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

But if a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a betrothed <S%H781><s%> <S%H8794><s%> damsel <S%H5291><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the man <S%H376><s%> force <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her, and lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her: then the man <S%H376><s%> only that lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

But unto the damsel <S%H5291><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> nothing <S%H1697><s%>; there is in the damsel <S%H5291><s%> no sin <S%H2399><s%> worthy of death <S%H4194><s%>: for as when a man <S%H376><s%> riseht <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, and slayeth <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H5315><s%> him, even so is this matter <S%H1697><s%>:

For he found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and the betrothed <S%H781><s%> <S%H8794><s%> damsel <S%H5291><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and there was none to save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%> her.

If a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a damsel <S%H5291><s%> that is a virgin <S%H1330><s%>, which is not betrothed <S%H781><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, and lay hold <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on her, and lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her, and they be found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>;

Then the man <S%H376><s%> that lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with her shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and she shall be his wife <S%H802><s%>; because he hath humbled <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8765><s%> her, he may <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not put her away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all his days <S%H3117><s%>.
A man <S%H376><s%> shall not take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, nor discover <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> skirt <S%H3671><s%>.
